in_brief: Dr.M.Megala is an Assistant Professor (Sl.Gr) in the Department of Applied Mathematics and Computational Sciences at PSG College of Technology, Coimbatore. She has over 15 years of experience in teaching. Her research publications appeared in peer-reviewed international journals and conference proceedings.

publications.title: 201941022354 A
